topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d0823c636872131d3d0000#post_53d0823c636872131d3d0000
[bq="Whatevs"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d081b66368721355250000#post_53d081b66368721355250000
I know what you're thinking... Poland invades[/bq]
I was thinking more along the lines of the entire games are actually a deranged elderly person going insane after living a life in fear of the soviet union and all the years of preparing for nuclear fallout but never happening with the soviet union disbanding drives him into delusions and the entire storyline of the games is him in the psychiatric ward and all the villains are actually the doctors with him trying to escape and the other patients as his fellow allies, but that works too.  I would have also gone with sharks with laser beams.
